titleStmt.title: The magistrates obligation to punish vice a sermon preach'd before the right worshipful the mayor, aldermen, sheriff, &c. of the town and county of Newcastle upon Tyne, at the parish Church of St. Nicholas, October 8, 1699, upon the election of the mayor / by Nathanael Ellison ...
titleStmt.author: Ellison, Nathanael, 1656 or 7-1721.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.B. for Richard Randell, bookseller in Newcastle upon Tyne, and sold by Luke Meredith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
